body_html:
For batch norm with multi-gpu statistics, the link given by @holyseven looks like a right implementation. Tensorpack also has such feature that works with its multigpu trainers.
For distributed batch norm, tensorpack has an implementation based on its HorovodTrainer but it would depend on uber/horovod#331

body:
For batch norm with multi-gpu statistics, the link given by @holyseven looks like a right implementation. Tensorpack also has such feature that works with its multigpu trainers.
For distributed batch norm, tensorpack has an implementation based on its HorovodTrainer but it would depend on https://github.com/uber/horovod/pull/331
